statements: SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_assessments;
SELECT assessment_date, compliance_rating FROM regulatory_compliance_assessments WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT company_name, compliance_rating FROM regulatory_compliance_assessments ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_assessments WHERE compliance_rating = 'Exceptional';
SELECT assessment_id, company_name FROM regulatory_compliance_assessments WHERE assessment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_assessments WHERE compliance_rating = 'Exceptional';
SELECT company_name, assessment_date FROM regulatory_compliance_assessments WHERE assessment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, compliance_rating FROM regulatory_compliance_assessments WHERE company_name LIKE 'A%' AND compliance_rating IN ('Exceptional', 'Good') ORDER BY company_name;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_assessments FROM regulatory_compliance_assessments;
SELECT AVG(assessment_id) AS avg_assessment_id, MAX(assessment_id) AS max_assessment_id FROM regulatory_compliance_assessments WHERE compliance_rating = 'Below Average';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_assessments;
SELECT assessment_name, assessment_status FROM regulatory_compliance_assessments WHERE assessment_status='Pending';
SELECT assessment_name, assessment_status, assessment_date FROM regulatory_compliance_assessments ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT assessment_name, assessment_status FROM regulatory_compliance_assessments WHERE assessment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_name, assessment_status FROM regulatory_compliance_assessments WHERE assessment_status='Completed';
SELECT assessment_name, assessment_status FROM regulatory_compliance_assessments;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_assessments ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_name, assessment_date FROM regulatory_compliance_assessments WHERE assessment_status = 'Completed';
SELECT assessment_id, count(detail_id) as total_details FROM assessment_details GROUP BY assessment_id;

SELECT assessment_name, control_id, control_status FROM regulatory_compliance_assessments JOIN assessment_details ON regulatory_compliance_assessments.assessment_id = assessment_details.assessment_id;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_assessments;
SELECT company_name, assessment_date FROM regulatory_compliance_assessments WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT assessment_id, detail_text FROM assessment_details ORDER BY assessment_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM assessment_details WHERE detail_status = FALSE AND detail_text LIKE '%urgent%';
SELECT company_name, assessment_date, compliance_status FROM regulatory_compliance_assessments WHERE assessment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_assessments ORDER BY assessment_date DESC, company_name ASC
SELECT company_name,assessment_date,compliance_status FROM regulatory_compliance_assessments WHERE compliance_status = TRUE
SELECT a.company_name,b.detail_text FROM regulatory_compliance_assessments a JOIN assessment_details b ON a.assessment_id = b.assessment_id

SELECT a.company_name,b.question,b.answer FROM regulatory_compliance_assessments a JOIN assessment_details c ON a.assessment_id = c.assessment_id JOIN assessment_answers b ON c.detail_id = b.detail_id
SELECT company_name,assessment_date FROM regulatory_compliance_assessments WHERE compliance_status = FALSE ORDER BY assessment_date DESC
SELECT * FROM regulatory_assessments;
SELECT assessment_name, assessment_date FROM regulatory_assessments WHERE assessment_name='Audit';
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM compliance_tasks WHERE task_due_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT assessment_name, regulatory_requirement FROM regulatory_assessments WHERE assessment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM compliance_details WHERE detail_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_assessments;
SELECT assessment_name, assessment_date FROM regulatory_assessments ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT regulatory_requirement FROM regulatory_assessments WHERE assessment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM compliance_tasks WHERE task_due_date BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT compliance_score, assessment_date FROM assessment_results INNER JOIN regulatory_assessments ON assessment_results.assessment_id = regulatory_assessments.assessment_id WHERE compliance_score < 80 ORDER BY compliance_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_assessments;
SELECT assessment_name, assessment_date FROM regulatory_compliance_assessments WHERE assessment_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM compliance_checklist ORDER BY checklist_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM compliance_issues WHERE issue_status = 'Open';
SELECT record_id, record_type, record_date FROM compliance_records WHERE record_type = 'Policy';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_assessments ORDER BY assessment_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT checklist_name, checklist_description FROM compliance_checklist WHERE checklist_id > 3;
SELECT issue_description, issue_status FROM compliance_issues WHERE issue_status = 'Open';
SELECT * FROM compliance_audit ORDER BY audit_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT record_type, record_date, record_description FROM compliance_records WHERE record_type LIKE '%Audit%' AND record_date >= '2022-01-01';
